body: Perhaps there is something I am doing wrong but I found this issue with the Sunlight hours analysis: When doing the analysis on a Brep I get: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/iHTeMy8PBD1jiMqIKCVqU*iXzA5oZgYKoq6snJXLA*J5Tpkv*OJtB5mAb4glqTwnYP431-qe9JXO3o1ZSljgmpB3zZmutqM8/SunlighthoursanalysisBrep.JPG) However with just a surface I get this: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/iHTeMy8PBD27bw044RYS6y5ovQLTSmVHI5RXkqpFx4NVN6BCypSuQ-3f-qNgCV6KPauLpBb4nLXtB0zEhpCgE9fvjEWq-lR-/SunlighthoursanalysisSurface.JPG)I have attached my GH file with the geometries internalized, please give me any pointers on what I am doing wrong and if this is a bug.
topic: Strange issue with Ladybug Sunlight hours analysis
